50411 Tartu linn,

description.en: The course consists of the following subjects: MVCM.13.016 Internal Medicine Propaedeutics, ARTO.01.018 Traumatology and Orthopaedics, ARKI.01.009 General Surgery, ARSK.03.007 Laboratory Medicine, ARHO.01.033 Radiology, ARSM.01.044 Sports Medicine and Rehabilitation I, see details under the programs of the abovementioned subjects.
description.et: Aine koosneb järgmistest ainetest: MVCM.13.016 Sisehaiguste propedeutika (4 EAP), ARTO.01.018 Traumatoloogia ja ortopeedia (1,5 EAP), ARKI.01.009 Üldkirurgia (3 EAP), ARSK.03.007 Laboratoorne meditsiin (1,5 EAP), ARHO.01.033 Radioloogia (4,5 EAP), ARSM.01.044 Spordimeditsiin ja taastusravi I (1,5 EAP), vt detaile loetletud ainete programmidest.

objectives.en: To obtain the basic clinical terminology, basics of diagnostic methods ( skills of interviewing, physical examination, laboratory, radiological and instrumental investigations) as well as interpreting major pathological changes.
objectives.et: Omandada kliinilise meditsiini põhiterminoloogia, diagnostikas kasutatavate meetodite põhialused (haige küsitlus,  füüsikaline läbivaatus, laboratoorsed, radioloogilised ja instrumentaalsed uurimisvõtted) ning suuremate haiguslike muutuste esialgne interpretatsioon.

learning_outcomes.en:
The students who have successfully passed the course
1) know the basic terminology of clinical medicine
2) are able to interview the patients, possess the methodology of colleeting a complete medical history
3) are able to perform clinical physical examination of patients and to find major pathological changes
4) are able to interprete data from medical history and major findings of physical examination
5) know the diagnostic possibilities of the most widely used laboratory and instrumental examinations
learning_outcomes.et:
Kursuse edukalt läbinud üliõpilased
1) tunnevad kliinilise meditsiini põhiterminoloogiat
2) oskavad haiget küsitleda
3) oskavad teha haige üldise füüsikalise läbivaatuse ja leida suuremad haiguslikud muutused
4) teavad põhiliste laboratoorsete, radioloogiliste ning instrumentaalsete uuringute võimalusi diagnostikas
4) oskavad interpreteerida anamneesist saadud andmeid ja suuremaid haige läbivaatusel kindlaks tehtud muutusi
5) teavad enamkasutatavate laboratoorsete, radioloogiliste ja instrumentaalsete uuringute diagnostilisi võimalusi

description.et:
In order to get the positive result it is necessary to obtain at least 60% of the maximum points in the final exam.
Before the final exam, it is obligatory to obtain at least 60% of the maximum points in the exams of the sub-courses.

grade_preconditions.et: See under subjects: MVCM.13.016 Internal Medicine Propaedeutics (part of Fundamentals of Diagnostics), ARTO.01.018 Traumatology and Orthopaedics, ARKI.01.009 General Surgery, ARSK.03.007 Laboratory Medicine, ARHO.01.033 Radiology, ARSM.01.044 Sports Medicine and Rehabilitation I

debt_elimination.et: See under subjects listed above. In agreement with the professor before the end of the semester.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
